thread.title: Gionnis A. Lopez (Gio)
thread.title_full: HablaCuba.com reviewed by Gionnis A. Lopez (Gio)

author: Gionnis A. Lopez (Gio)
title: Gionnis A. Lopez (Gio)
text:
Since I got here to USA, exactly in Atlanta, a year an half I have been using Hablacuba, and I have not received any offer like discount or something, and I call every other week to Cuba, I don't like to switch companies to check which one has better offers, but I'm thinking about it.
In another hand, sometimes it's hard for me to dial since I have to dial my ID number and then dial the cuba phone number.
But the calling service is good, I can't complain.
Thanks
